thread.title: ‘Air Yoshinoya’ takes flight on JAL for limited time only
thread.title_full: ‘Air Yoshinoya’ takes flight on JAL for limited time only

title: ‘Air Yoshinoya’ takes flight on JAL for limited time only
text:
‘Air Yoshinoya’ takes flight on JAL for limited time only Wednesday September 2, 2015 Print Article 
JAL and Yoshinoya bring a touch of Japanese comfort food to the skies. — Picture via JAL.co.jp TOKYO, Sept 2 — If you’re flying out of Japan on a Japan Airlines flight bound for Europe or North America, you might want to keep an eye out for Yoshinoya’s signature beef bowl on the inflight menu. 
In what will be the fourth collaboration between the airline and the fast food chain, the dish of beef sukiyaki cooked with fully aged meat and onions and served on top of steamed rice is adapted from the restaurant’s popular Beef Sukiyaki Banezen menu. 
It will be offered to economy and premium economy passengers until November 30. 
Itadakimasu !
